definitions: To be unable to understand something.
To find something too difficult or strange to comprehend.
examples: I can't get my head around these complex equations.
She just can't get her head around why he would do that.
We couldn't get our heads around the new policy changes.
lemma: can't get your head around sth
synonyms: can't make head or tail of sth
can't wrap your head around sth
source: can't get your head around sth
